Posts.EditableText: I'm creating a new game, and it's my very first. It's called "Dr. Mad and the Aztek Temple Of Dangers You Don't Want To Know About for Reasons Unbeknownst To You". It plays on mad scientist stereotypes, and stereotypes in general. If you have any hints for a first time writer, please respond.
